## css2rgb() function

Converts a standard CSS color to an {<!-- -->r, g, b<!-- -->} object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function css2rgb(css: string, _alpha?: number): Rgb;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  css | string | the css color hex string |
|  \_alpha | number | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Rgb](./color.rgb.md)
